body: I don't understand. If the artist knows anatomy why did they draw the demon licking through her ear and tonguing her brain then licked the front of her eyebrow?? After the demon French kissed her she brought her tongue all the way through her digestive tract and out her anus. How'd she get her tongue out? Does she have shit in her esophagus now? In her stomach?? I need to sit down. ⚠️ I am very confused.
who is the artist of first story?
